landing.title: Master Your Interviews with AI
landing.subtitle: Evalion Vertex is not just an app — it’s your personal AI interview coach. Experience a futuristic platform that provides instant, intelligent feedback to help you master your skills and land your dream job.
landing.responsiveDesignText: Experience a living interface — smooth, responsive, and glowing with vertex gradients that adapt and flow with you.
landing.intelligenceCoreText: Powered by Google Gemini, enabling intelligent, real-time conversations and tailored interview simulations.
landing.analyticsHubText: AI-backed performance metrics and personalized suggestions on a visual dashboard that shines like a hologram.
landing.mobileAppSubtitle: Cinematic 3D pages, ultra-real visuals, and next-gen creative power — now on your Android device.
landing.welcomeTourText: This is your AI-powered partner for interview preparation.
landing.featuresTourText: Leverage Google Gemini for smart analysis, enjoy a responsive design, and track your progress with our analytics hub.
landing.ctaTourText: Click here to log in or sign up and begin your first practice session.
landing.mobileTourText: Practice on the go by downloading our app from the Google Play Store.
